javax.realtime
Class SchedulingParameters

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--javax.realtime.SchedulingParameters
Direct Known Subclasses:
PriorityParameters
public abstract class SchedulingParameters
extends java.lang.Object

Subclasses of SchedulingParameters (ImportanceParameters, and any others defined for particular schedulers) provide the parameters to be used by the Scheduler. Changes to the values in a parameters object affects the scheduling behaviour of all the Schedulable objects to which it is bound. Caution: Subclasses of this class are explicitly unsafe in multithreaded situations when they are being changed. No synchronization is done. It is assumed that users of this class who are mutating instances will be doing their own synchronization at a higher level.
